task.title: Configuring cluster membership by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can configure cluster membership of servers by using the Cluster Membership page in the .

context.p: You can configure the cluster membership of an server by using the , or by using . For more information about using to configure cluster membership, see .
For more information about the components that you must specify when you configure cluster membership, see .

step.cmd: Go to the Cluster Membership page:

choices.choice: From the Cluster menu, click Join/Leave.

step.cmd: Click Edit in the Configuration pane and enter configuration details.

choices.choice: To add the server to the cluster, click Restart server and join cluster in the Status pane.
To reset cluster configuration settings to default values, select Reset in the Configuration pane.

step.cmd: To remove the server from the cluster, click Leave cluster in the Status pane.
